enum.name: InitResult
enum.comment: Result code sent with INIT_INIT packet
enum.value: The official client won't display a message until the connection from the server is closed 3

enum.name: InitBanType
enum.comment: Ban type sent with INIT_INIT packet. The official client treats a value >= 2 as Permanent. Otherwise, it's Temporary.

enum.name: ChatResult
enum.comment: Result code sent with Chat_Result packets

enum.name: LoginResult
enum.comment: Result code sent with LOGIN_REPLY packet. Indicates the result of a login attempt.
enum.value: The official client won't display a message until the connection from the server is closed 4
The official client won't display a message until the connection from the server is closed 6

enum.name: PlayerKilledState
enum.comment: Flag to indicate that a player has been killed

enum.name: CharacterIcon
enum.comment: Icon displayed in paperdolls, books, and the online list

enum.name: WarpEffect
enum.comment: An effect that accompanies a player warp
enum.value: Plays the admin warp sound effect and animation 2

enum.name: WarpTimeChangeType
enum.comment: Defines the change type for warp time.

struct.name: PubFile
struct.comment: A pub file (EIF, ENF, ECF, ESF)

struct.name: PlayersListFriends
struct.comment: Information about online players. Sent in reply to friends list requests.

struct.name: OnlinePlayer
struct.comment: A player in the online list

struct.name: EquipmentCharacterSelect
struct.comment: Player equipment data. Sent with a character in the character selection list. Note that these values are graphic IDs.

struct.name: EquipmentPlay
struct.comment: Player equipment data. Sent upon selecting a character and entering the game Note that these values are item IDs.

struct.name: EquipmentMapInfo
struct.comment: Player equipment data. Sent with map information about a nearby character. Note that these values are graphic IDs.

field.name: npc_id
field.comment: If set character will appear as this NPC

struct.name: ItemMapInfo
struct.comment: Information about a nearby item on the ground

struct.name: QuestItemMapInfo
struct.comment: Information about a nearby quest item on the ground

packet.comment: Nearby player casting spell on their self

field.name: hp
field.comment: The official client reads this if the packet is larger than 12 bytes

field.name: tp
field.comment: The official client reads this if the packet is larger than 12 bytes

packet.comment: Response from talking to an inn-keeper NPC
Reply to requesting to sleep at an inn
Reply to subscribing to a town
Reply to giving up citizenship of a town
Reply to picking up an item
Result to connection initialization and requests for unencrypted data. This packet is unencrypted.

case.comment: The official client treats any value below 2 as a temporary ban. The official server sends 1, but some game server implementations erroneously send 0.

enum.name: AdminMessageType
enum.comment: Type of message sent to admins via the Help menu

packet.comment: Shows "come and join" message in status bar
Show banner when game is launched
Other play gathered item before you
Nearby player started casting a spell

field.name: requester_name
field.comment: Name of player who requested current song

packet.comment: Reply to unsuccessfully requesting a song
Reply to successfully requesting a song
Reply from being too low level to use a shop
Value compared against client value. If they don't match a blank popup is spammed every ping (after 30 pings)
Player has appeared in nearby view
Nearby player transformed into an npc
Silently adds message to system tab
Clears all GLB messages from name
Reply to trying to send a private message

field.name: banner_display_duration
field.comment: Number of seconds the banner is shown. The client expects a value of 2 or higher

field.name: permanent
field.comment: If true the banner will show until a new banner is shown or the player logs out

packet.comment: Reply to placing an item in to a chest
Reply to removing an item from a chest

field.name: sfx_id
field.comment: Only plays if unk1 and unk2 are set too

packet.comment: Reply to picking up an npc
Nearby player standing from a chair
Nearby player sitting in a chair
Reply to trying to fish overweight
Nearby NPC killed by player and item dropped
Requesting player to warp to another map
